---
category: news
title: "City of Denver taps Boulder tech company for AI-enhanced crosswalks"
excerpt: "A Boulder technology company has been selected by the City of Denver to use its hardware and software to help improve pedestrian safety at traffic crossings. Boulder AI, founded in 2017, has developed an artificial intelligence platform that makes decisions based on traffic flow analytics and pedestrian behavior to inform real-time interventions."
